name: Sooper Froot
overview: It's a slot machine in your very own living room! Sooper Froot is a colorful adaptation of the popular English pub fruit-machine game. At the start of the game the player is given a stake of 2.00 and places best on .10 on the chance of obtaining one of the winning combinations. More than a simple slot machine Sooper Froot incorporates features of hold, nudge and re-spin to further test your luck and challenge your gambling skills.
